content: Remember the day I set you free, I told you, you could always count on me, darling. From that day on, I made a vow. I'll be there when you want me, someway, somehow. Oh, baby there ain't no mountain high enough, ain't no valley low enough, ain't no river wide enough, to keep me from getting to you, babe.
author: Marvin Gaye & Tammi Terrell
